JsonSource

Reads a Json Source file and converts it to LUA tables

Summary
JsonSourceReads a Json Source file and converts it to LUA tables
Functions
create()Create an instance of the class and initalizes the Global JSON object
process(file)Process the JSON file and convert it into tables
getGameObjects()Return the table of GameObjects
